problem_text_cn: 如图,把平行四边形ABCD分成4个平行四边形,已知其中三个面积分别为8、10、30,则第四个平行四边形的面积是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the parallelogram ABCD is divided into N_0 parallelograms. It is known that the three areas are N_1, N_2, and N_3, then the area of ​​the fourth parallelogram is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵平行四边形ABCD被分成4个平行四边形,∴AB∥EF∥CD,AD∥MN∥BC,∴四边形AMOE与四边形MBFO同高,底分别为OE与OF,四边形EOND与四边形OFCN同高,底分别为OE与OF,∴\frac{S_{四边形AEMO}}{S_{四边形MBFO}}=\frac{OE}{OF}=\frac{8}{10}=\frac{4}{5},∴\frac{S_{四边形EOND}}{S_{四边形OFCN}}=\frac{OE}{OF},即:\frac{S_{四边形EOND}}{30}=\frac{4}{5},∴S~四边形EOND~=24．故选:C．
